A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly thought I was actually watching a sequel to \"Space Balls\". The goofy characters\, the ridiculous uniforms (what's up with the jumbo pens replacing the rank/ribbons?)\, the bad acting\, the horrible plot...a truely horrendious film. If only Disney had gone with the Expanded Univers timeline\, that has lots of great plots and characters (esp. the Thrawn series). We can only hope Disney hasn't forever ruined the franchise. Maybe they are already gearing up for a \"reboot\" since they have lowered our expectations so much with the last 2 pieces of dreck.
